Tag_Youmay.description: the memory of Kassandra | [[The Silver Vein]], a branch of the [[Cult of Kosmos]] this memory is based on

General_Description: '''The Silver Vein''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: The [[Cult of Kosmos|Cultists]] of [[the Silver Vein]] amassed wealth through war, slavery, and when that didn't work, theft. So long as they lived, the Cult would have drachmae, and lots of it.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra eliminated every member of the Silver Vein branch.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
